taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family Polygonaceae;subfamily Eriogonoideae;genus Eriogonum;species cithariforme;variety cithariforme;

bio:treatment.discussion: Variety cithariforme is usually uncommon throughout its range in the mountains and foothills of southwestern California (Kern, Los Angeles, San Bernardino, San Luis Obispo, Santa Barbara, and Ventura counties). In vigorous plants, the winged petiole is striking.
